item.title: Rocket Lab Reports Q2 Results: Is the Bull Thesis Still Intact?
item.description: Despite missing EPS estimates, RKLB delivered strong Q2 2025 revenue results, with sales up 36% YoY, driven by launch activity and satellite growth.
